price: [Sasabihin]: “Ito ay ang ipinangangako sa inyo – para sa bawat palabalik, mapag-ingat,
arabic: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hādhā mā tūʿadūna likulli awwābin ḥafīẓin
